title: The pernicious consequences of the new heresie of the Jesuites against the King and the state by an advocate of Parliament.
author: Nicole, Pierre, 1625-1695.
publisher: Printed by J. Flesher, for Richard Royston ...,
notes: Translated by John Evelyn from Nicole's Les pernicieuses conséquences de la nouvelle hérésie des Jesuites, 1664.
Sometimes wrongly ascribed to Antoine Arnauld.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
